name: Lucah: Born of a Dream
description: You can't help but feel you've been here before. You can't help but feel they only want to hurt you. But you know you must move forward. You must fight.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.8GHz or faster Graphics: Any from the last 4 years Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.5GHz or faster Graphics: Graphics Card with Shader Model 3 support, 2GB video memory Storage: 2 GB available space
